@Sepalika Seneviratne That IS exactly the problem . Those idiots who want to believe something will latch on to anything that's being floated around by gossipmongers whose lives are so boring that all they do is sling mud at others !  So any misdeed or crime that occurs anywhere in the country IS DONE by Rajapaksas they shout repeatedly. Malicious slander is the name of the game and is much easier these days using cyberspace !  How about Minister Arjuna Ranatunga ordering his security guard to shoot at the employees when he entered forcefully in to his ministerial office killing two employees? NowTHAT is a killing - a murder by the man himself ! But nobody cries foul about that, eh? If U want the number of killinhgs of journalists lawyers and lots of other innocents besides under Premadasa regime it will take volumes ! ppl have short memories or prefer to ignore history for their own reasons. It's not worth trying even this much for those whose brains are stuck firmly in their backsides

Brigadier Deshapriya Gunawardhana who commanded the Army battalion which murdered two school students and a youth employed in Colombo while firing at the Rathupaswala residents demanding for drinking water, has been appointed as the Military Attach for Sri Lankan Embassy in Turkey.

@gary wilson  Sorry, you are a total idiot! Who ordered and killed innocent school children at Rathupaswella, Who ordered and  killed  27 prisons calling by their names, who killed Lasantha? who killed Eknaligoda? who killed 38 Jounalists?

@Sepalika Seneviratne No he didn't. These are fabrications to slander him just like the Lamborghini, Golden horses etc fibs. If you accuse anyone of serious crimes u need to prove all that before a court of law. Otherwise it's all Fox News stuff ! By the way Ranil was in America learning how to defeat MR (he said it himself) may be Fox News coached him how to create fake news to maliciousy slander his opponent to bring him to disrepute in the eyes of the public. Remember how Trump challenged Obama over his citizenship ?
@gary wilson Don't you see that Gotabaya killed innocent kids and whoever criticized his wrongdoings and illegal activities.

@Sepalika Seneviratne The worst terror regime was under R Premadasa. JRJ started it all with Black July. People who lived under those murderous regimes are very grateful to the Rajapaksa regime for stopping that carnage completely. Would U really prefer living in a blood bath than in peace time?  What did the Yahapalanaya do ?  Bring back bombs. U must be very happy with that ?
